Name: Siddharth
AboutMe:
Taxeeta (Beta) finds you a taxi (cabs) around you! By searching and finding you a cab in your vicinity, Taxeeta reduces the chances of cancellation and late arrivals significantly. We enable the cab drivers with sophisticated software to know their location, and also help you connect to them directly.

We know what a pain it is to get a cab if you live in Baner, Aundh, Wakad or Hinjewadi. We are focusing on building a true cab aggregator product to help searching Wings, TravelTime, EasyCabs, Corporate Cabs, Local (Blue) CoolCabs and non-branded cabs to maximize your reach and help you find a cab quickly.

Here's how it works: We contact all the cabs in your vicinity. Gather all those cabs who are available around you, and let you make a choice of which driver to choose. Their contact details are shared with you. Based on your budget and distance from the cab, you can choose from the list to speak with the driver directly!

Taxeeta is a completely transparent platform and passes the choice and control to you. Currently available in Pune, we are working on adding more cities and cabs.
